title: Swan Lake
creator_credit: Ekran Creative Union Gosteleradio, Inessa Seleznova, Felix Slidovker and Askhat Murtazin
brief_description: Presents a magnificent performance of the ballet “Swan Lake” by the Bolshoi Ballet with music by Tchaikovsky. Features Natalia Bessmertnova, Alexander Bogatirov and Boris Akimov.
